item.description:
Easy bike ride on the Avon section of the Rails to Trails bike path. The ride is about 9 miles (up and back total) and is an easy, flat, paved surface. Beginner to average ride. All are welcome and could turn back at any time!
Please meet up at 10:45 for a 11:00 start. We will meet at Sperry Park parking lot in Avon. Sperry Park is directly off of Rt.44. It is an industrial Park set way back from the road. Watch and follow signs for the bike path!


Directions:Directly off rt.44 in Avon - not far from the base of Avon Mountain!


Look for a white Tracker with Kayak racks!!

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Rails to Trails bike Ride
